reviews.title: Patient Stories
reviews.description: See what our patients in Los Angeles have to say about their recovery.

items.review1: "Before I received any treatments, I suffered a lot with frequent headaches. After receiving treatment my headaches disappeared for good and it was hard for me to believe that it was the power of the adjustment."
items.review2: "Within two months, my headaches were completely gone. After having experienced such agony and pain every single day for two years straight, this was truly a miracle for me!!!!!!"
items.review3: "My period came back to normal within these two weeks and my TMJ is basically gone. I can open my mouth without my jaw getting stuck and my migraines have disappeared as well. Dr. Park really knows what she’s doing!"

hero.title: A Legacy of Specific Healing
hero.description: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. is one of only a handful of doctors in the United States, and the first and only Korean American, capable of practicing the Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Chiropractic technique.

bio.title: Meet Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S.
bio.p1: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. is Board Certified and an expert in the field of Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Chiropractic. A graduate of Yonsei University—one of Korea's most prestigious research institutions—she went on to receive her doctorate from Life University in Atlanta, where she graduated summa cum laude and received the prestigious Clinical Excellence Award.
bio.p2: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. considers it the most fortunate opportunity in her life to have met her mentor, the late Dr. Clarence Jenson. As a former leader and teacher of Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Chiropractic, Dr. Jenson was trained directly under Dr. B.J. Palmer, the developer of chiropractic. Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. is proud to be a successor of this distinguished lineage.
bio.p3: Beyond her clinical practice, Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. is a passionate community leader. She has been hosting a 40-minute weekly radio show on Radio Korea for 12 years, helping the community gain a better understanding of chiropractic benefits and techniques.

education.title: Education & Credentials
education.lifeDc: Life University: Doctor of Chiropractic (D.C.), Summa Cum Laude
education.lifeMs: Life University: M.S. in Sport Injury Management

cta.title: Trusted Expert Care
cta.description: Experience the difference of care from a distinguished leader in Palmer Specific Chiropractic.

message.title: Message From Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S.
message.intro: Everyone has been in pain once. But of those people, there are patients and families who have to carry the enormous pain of living with illnesses.
message.q1: Why am I in so much pain? Why am I getting sick?
message.a1: Regarding "Why?", modern medicine is unable to provide a precise answer and simply puts the focus on treating the symptoms. However, there is surely bound to be a cause of pain and sickness. That exact cause is the "block of nerve flow" in the upper cervical vertebrae.
message.innate: The human body has infinite vitality; basically everyone is born with "Innate Intelligence". The human body is a super computer which modern medicine is no match in imitating. Our body was not made to survive by us consciously manipulating it. Without us paying attention to it, our body "automatically" controls our heartbeat, adrenaline levels, blood pressure, digestion of our food and more. This is vitality and all people are born with it.
message.quote: However, this ability is inhibited when pressure is put on the nerves that pass through the upper cervical vertebrae and the flow of signals isn’t smooth, therefore leading to many illnesses.

philosophy.title: The Philosophy of Chiropractic
philosophy.p1: Chiropractic is a healing method with a profound philosophy of restoring the body’s "Innate Intelligence" using only the hands for the procedure (Chiro= hand, practic= practice). Basically, it is the coming together of philosophy, science, and art.
philosophy.p2: Unlike modern medicine that solely pursues the treatment of symptoms, chiropractic is a practice that focuses on treating the main cause of many diseases, SUBLUXATION, and letting the body work on recovering and restoring its natural ability to recuperate.

technique.title: A Rare and Specific Technique
technique.p1: Chiropractic is not a massage, but a correcting procedure performed using the doctor’s hands to adjust the patient’s spine and remove subluxation so the body can recover on its own.
technique.p2: This doctor has studied under the last remaining pupil of the legendary Dr. B.J. Palmer (1881-1961), the late Dr. Clarence Jensen. Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. treats the nerve adjustment as her mission, spreading her knowledge and making it her goal to guard the health of the community.

paradigm.title: A Paradigm Shift
paradigm.content: Chiropractic is not about diagnosing and treating the symptoms. By eliminating subluxation, the body will show its amazing ability to recover by itself. When the Creator made humans, He made them to live happily and healthy, not to live sick and in pain.

key.title: The Key to Healthiness
key.p1: The difference between healthy and unhealthy people is found in the upper cervical vertebrae. With a slight dislocation, people may not recognize the pressure being put on the nerve until they get sick, which may even lead to disastrous results.
key.p2: The most important factor is prevention. Instead of trying to treat pain and sickness when it has progressed, it would be best to look out for your health while you’re still healthy. This is why everyone from children to the elderly should get their upper cervical vertebrae checked regularly.

contact.title: Visit Our Office
contact.description: Conveniently located in the heart of Los Angeles, we offer expert care with a focus on Palmer Upper Cervical techniques. Free parking validation available.

about.title: About Chiropractic
about.p1: At Yonsei Chiropractic, we believe the human body has an amazing, innate ability to recover itself from illness or injury.
about.p2: The chiropractic method is the best approach to health because it allows the body to work without the use of any drugs, whether prescribed or non-prescribed. Our practice is built on the philosophy that true healing comes from removing interference in the nervous system.

manual.title: A Pure Manual Technique
manual.p1: We strictly follow the principle that the application of medicine, surgery, physical therapy, acupressure massage, or acupuncture is never utilized for spinal correction.
manual.p2: Only the use of the doctor’s hands is employed to adjust the spine in order to target the stem of all illnesses caused by subluxation.

about.p3: When there is pressure on the nerves from dislocated vertebrae, the flows of nerve signals are not smooth, and the body's innate ability to heal is inhibited. This phenomenon is what we address through specific adjustments.
about.p4: By treating subluxation, the body will recover on its own and restore its optimal health once again. Our staff can promise you a comfortable environment and experience conducive to your healing journey.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Care
comprehensive.p1: On each visit, Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. seeks to regain and maintain the proper alignment of the spine, aiding each patient through the process of recovery and healing. Once the body and its organs are able to regain their mental impulse supply, then they are able to rebuild and perform their proper functions.

upperCervical.title: About Upper Cervical Care
upperCervical.subtitle: Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Chiropractic (H.I.O.)
upperCervical.p1: Yonsei Chiropractic is the first Korean American chiropractic in the United States to specialize in the Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Technique, also known as the "hole-in-one" method (H.I.O).
upperCervical.p2: The practice of the H.I.O. is a high degree chiropractic technique that uses only the hands to adjust the upper cervical bones. This specific region, known as the cervical vertebrae numbers 1 and 2, is adjusted to absolve the root of all illnesses by relieving the pressure on the nerves.
upperCervical.p3: The application of medicine, surgery, physical therapy, acupressure massage, or acupuncture is never utilized. Only the use of the doctor’s hands is employed to adjust the upper cervical in order to target the stem of all illnesses caused by subluxation. By treating subluxation, the body will recover on its own and restore its optimal health once again.

legacy.title: The Legacy of Dr. B.J. Palmer
legacy.p1: Dr. B.J. Palmer (1881-1961) invented this procedure in 1930 after discovering that many patients with incurable diseases recovered after receiving the miraculous procedure. This has been proven to be effective in his many writings and research findings.
legacy.p2: Because of its technical difficulty and scarcity, very few doctors in the United States are able to perform the H.I.O technique today. As the first Korean chiropractor to utilize the technique, Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. practices H.I.O. on patients who suffer from severe pain and chronic diseases.

diagnostics.title: Advanced Diagnostics
diagnostics.p1: The treatment is not based solely on observing the symptoms of the illness. It begins with a deep clinical examination:
diagnostics.xrays: Precision X-Rays: Detailed views of the cervical bone structure and the specific nature of the dislocation.
diagnostics.instruments: Nervo-scope & Analagraph: Specialized instruments used to understand the exact state of the nerves and locate interference.

upperCervical.quote: "The human body has the amazing ability to recover itself from illness or injury. However, if the flows of nerve signals are not smooth then that innate ability is inhibited. This phenomenon happens when there is pressure on the nerves from dislocated cervical bones. Therefore, with the adjustment of the cervical bones the body will find its ability to recover itself."
upperCervical.p4: Patients have seen a remarkable difference in their health, with many visiting from the East Coast or Korea just to receive this treatment. Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. personally diagnoses and treats each and every patient, taking pride in finding, targeting, and connecting the root of illness.

subluxation.title: Subluxation
subluxation.p1: Subluxation is when the spinal bones become slightly dislocated, developing on the nerves, resulting in a disruption of the natural flow of signals between the body and the brain.
subluxation.p2: One of the World Health Organization’s (WHO) main principle is that "(h)ealth is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity." This is very true in most cases. Just because a person does not feel pain or have any diagnoses of disease, it does not mean they are 100% in good condition.

silent.title: The Silent Progress of Illness
silent.p1: Our body is made up of neurons, in which 67% of them are efferent nerves. These nerves do not send immediate pain signals until significant amount of damage is present.
silent.p2: Therefore, even without pain there can be an organ disorder in progress.

subluxation.p3: Without knowing it, your body may have high blood pressure, arthritis may be in progress, or cancer cells may be multiplying. If the flow of signals is blocked and nerves have pressure put on them, the result is failure in function, leading to illnesses. It is a misconception that illnesses happen immediately. However, it takes a while before most serious illnesses steadily display themselves.
subluxation.p4: The body’s nerves are put under pressure over a long period of time and in the end start to show symptoms of pain. We are always worried and focused on the individual organs in our body and trying to take away the pain immediately if there is a disturbance.

cause.title: Targeting the Cause
cause.p1: However, it is necessary to first target the cause. The real source lies within the alignment of the spine and the nerve signals that are being sent out.

innateIntelligence.title: Innate Intelligence
innateIntelligence.p1: Since the moment of your conception, a miracle began for you. This miracle called life has an "innate (inborn) intelligence" that caused two cells to multiply and differentiate into the trillions of cells that became you.
innateIntelligence.p2: The innate intelligence knew exactly what you needed, and exactly when you needed it. All of this development happens naturally as long there is no interference. Otherwise, that flow of the intelligence cannot go through properly.

vital.title: A Vital System
vital.p1: As the number of cells grew, your innate intelligence needed a system to send and receive messages in order to control and coordinate all functions and parts of the body.
vital.p2: This vital system was the first to develop and began within 18 days of conception.

innateIntelligence.p3: It is so valuable and delicate that its primary parts are the only organs encased in bone. This system is your nervous system and the primary parts are the brain protected by the skull and the spinal cord protected by the spine.

consequence.title: The Consequence of Interference
consequence.p1: What would happen if this intelligence, which flows through the nerves and is filled with vital life messages, could not reach the proper destination at the right time?
consequence.p2: What if this interference blocked messages being sent to your vital organs? Do you think this would cause these organs and yourself not to live at your highest potential? Of course, it would.

innateIntelligence.quote: "All diseases result from a disruption of the flow of intelligence."
innateIntelligence.cause: Chiropractically speaking, "The one cause of all disease is our inability to adapt."
innateIntelligence.p4: Our goal at Yonsei Chiropractic is to remove the interference in your nervous system, allowing your innate intelligence to flow perfectly once again and restoring your body's natural ability to adapt and heal.

tmj.title: TMJ / TMD Treatment
tmj.p1: Specialized chiropractic care for Temporomandibular Joint Disorders and related jaw tension.

connection.title: The Upper Cervical Connection
connection.p1: Because the upper cervical spine (the top two vertebrae in the neck) sits so closely to the jaw joints, misalignment in the neck can often manifest as TMJ/TMD symptoms.
connection.p2: Head and neck misalignment can cause interference in the nervous system, leading to muscle tension in the jaw, clicking, popping, and pain.

symptoms.title: Symptoms We Treat
symptoms.clicking: Clicking or popping sounds in the jaw

expertise.title: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S.'s Expertise
expertise.p1: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. is dedicated to using her professional expertise to help patients with TMJ/TMD. By restoring head/neck alignment and utilizing specialty extremity adjustments, we address the root cause of the jaw dysfunction.
expertise.p2: Our approach is drug-free and seeks to re-activate the body's natural self-healing process.

carAccident.title: Car Accidents & Whiplash

pain.title: Pain? No Pain?
pain.p1: The aftereffect symptoms of a car accident normally show 1~2 days, or even a few months after the accident. In fact, the absence of pain doesn’t necessarily mean there is no damage. Many of the symptoms caused by a car accident or trauma lay dormant until later.
pain.p2: If nerves are put under pressure after the accident, it will not only result in pain, but it will lead to more severe illness. Car accidents can cause damage in many parts of the body such as 7 possible locations in the upper cervical vertebrae and 32 joints and muscles throughout the body.

whiplash.title: The Nature of Whiplash
whiplash.p1: During a car accident, one’s head experiences an abrupt backward or forward jerking motion. This damages the upper cervical vertebrae. Such injury is hard to detect even with a CT scan or MRI.
whiplash.p2: Because of this characteristic, an aftereffect of a car accident can become chronic. If the upper cervical suffers due to excessive pressure, it will prevent normal movement of the body and will lead to further health problems.

damage.title: Nerve Damage vs. Contusion
damage.p1: Sometimes people confuse nerve damage with simple contusion and try treating symptoms with physical therapy, acupuncture, and massages.
damage.p2: Those treatments cannot recover nerves under pressure and instead only temporarily eliminate pain. Not treating the nerves properly will worsen the condition and result in chronic pain.

carAccident.quote: The aftereffects of a car accident require immediate attention and continuous care.

hero.title: Our Specialized Care
hero.subtitle: Specializing in the Palmer Upper Cervical Specific Technique (H.I.O) and comprehensive chiropractic services in Los Angeles.

philosophy.title: Re-activating Brain-to-Body Communication
philosophy.p1: Misalignment at the point where the head and neck join can cause interference, or "subluxation," preventing the brain from sending healing messages. Upper Cervical Corrective Health Care is designed to restore this alignment and allow the body's natural self-healing process to begin.

step1.title: Examination
step1.desc: Dr. Hyeon Joo Park, D.C., M.S. takes X-rays of the upper cervical region and full spine to examine the degree of misalignment.

step2.title: Adjustment
step2.desc: The procedure is performed by the doctor's hands to restore head, neck, and spinal alignment.

step3.title: Self-Healing
step3.desc: As the vertebrae align, the brain sends healing messages to the body to begin natural self-healing.

accessibilityPage.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibilityPage.intro: Yonsei Chiropractic is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

conformance.title: Conformance Status
conformance.body: The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. Yonsei Chiropractic is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.body: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Yonsei Chiropractic. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers on our website:
feedback.address: Visitor Address: 3200 Wilshire Blvd Suite 302, Los Angeles, CA 90010

technical.title: Technical Specifications
technical.body: Accessibility of Yonsei Chiropractic relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:

assessment.title: Assessment Approach
assessment.body: Yonsei Chiropractic assessed the accessibility of our website by the following approaches:

approval.title: Formal Approval of this Accessibility Statement
approval.body: This Accessibility Statement is approved by: Yonsei Chiropractic
